src.utils package¶

Submodules¶

src.utils.dictionaries module¶

Dictionaries for ENTSOE API (endpoints and area codes).

src.utils.utils module¶

src.utils.utils.dynamodb_exception(func)[source]¶

Decorator to handle dynamodb exceptions

src.utils.utils.generate_file_name(endpoint, area, current_date, start_date, end_date)[source]¶

Generates a file name for the fetched data.

Parameters

  • endpoint – The endpoint to fetch data from.

  • area – The area to fetch data from.

  • current_date – The current date.

  • start_date – The start date of the data to fetch.

  • end_date – The end date of the data to fetch.

Returns

A string with the generated file name.

src.utils.utils.upload_file_to_s3(s3_client, file_name, bucket, object_name=None)[source]¶

Upload a file to an S3 bucket

Parameters

  • s3_client – The S3 client to use.

  • file_name – File to upload

  • bucket – Bucket to upload to

  • object_name – S3 object name. If not specified then file_name is used

Returns

True if file was uploaded, else False.
